name: Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil

rulings.text: Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil doesn’t itself allow you to search your library. You must have another spell or ability that instructs you to search it.
You can reveal Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil any time while searching your library before you shuffle it.
If you have multiple copies in your library while searching it, you may reveal all of them, provided you can pay the {1}{B} for each of them.

If you search your library multiple times in the same turn, each Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil in that library can be revealed once that turn. You may reveal multiples to prove you have multiples.

text:
Flying, first strike, trample
Once each turn, while you're searching your library, you may pay {1}{B}, reveal Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil from your library and say "I'm coming, too!" If you do, Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil deals 2 damage to a player of your choice.
